transcript: - Hey guys, it's Justine, and today we have a very exciting unboxing. I know I say that quite often, but this is something all new from DJI. This is their first little baby steps into FPV drone flying. FPV drones are completely different than most of the consumer drones that most of us are used to flying. I've done some FPV flying before, but not really that much. So I'm very excited to test this out without further ado, We're gonna unbox, and get to it. (upbeat music) Oh my goodness. Oh, it's heavy. Heavy boy. (headset rolling) Controller. Let's get everything out. Gosh, there's so many goodies in here. This is an authentic smile. Sometimes I smile and I'm crying inside, but this is real, there are no tears inside. Holy crap. I can't wait to take this out. Looks like this is the propellers. So this is the "A" propellers. (unboxing) This is the B propeller box. They're also red tips. I thought we were gonna get like a different tip color. So to be able to identify which one is the "A" and which one is the "B," You'll see the inner circle of the "A" is red, the "B" is black. (assembling) Oh shoot. Look at this, Oh boy. We've got some more boxes. (unboxing) That is a very large power adopter. What is this? (gasps) Oh my gosh I can change his outfit. Oh. Oh, wow. Look at all of this. (bight upbeat music) We're all gonna end up walking around like this one day you know, hi, I'm Justine nice to meet you, I'm COVID negative. So here's everything that came inside of the fly more combo kit. Now the cool thing about this is yes, it is an FPV drone so you can fly a traditional FPV. So if you do take your hands off the throttles, the drone is going to drop out of the air. But they also have the modes that we're familiar with in previous DJI drones, so you can fly this normally. This is really great way to ease your way into FPV drone flying. The only thing that I do want to note is FPV drone flying has been around for a really long time, and a lot of these pilots have worked so hard to create their own drones. Most of them are made basically from scratch. This is a way to make it more accessible, but I don't want that to discredit all of the hard work and effort, and the time that all of these pilots have put in. The years of building and perfecting their drones. I see you, we see you. We don't forget. I'm a noob, (laughs), hi. Time to charge up the batteries, update the firmware, and I've got a lot to learn. (calm music) (bright upbeat music) I've never been afraid to fly a drone before but this is something that's entirely different. I'm not very comfortable flying FPV. So this is kind of really like my first big leap into it. Now the good thing about this drone though, is I can fly it like a normal Mavic, which I'm incredibly comfortable with, but you could flip this thing into sport mode and you can go so fast but thankfully there's really not a lot of stuff that I can hit out here. The real question that I'm asking myself is, am I going to be brave enough to pop this into manual for the first time in this video? I'm not entirely sure. I'm a little bit nervous. I feel like I kind of want to work up to it cause I don't wanna crash the drone. I have been doing the in-flight tutorials. There's an app where you can race in different settings. Kind of like a simulator, but nothing simulates real life. Okay. Let's just do this. Let's just do it. So here she is. Oh wow. That is aggressive. Nothing about this drone is subtle, at all. All right. No better time than now. This is weird. It's like I'm outside my body. (drone flying) (car engine roaring) (bright upbeat music) I got so close to his car. Holy crap. That was so scary. You guys, I'm still learning my controls. Yes, okay. Return to home. I'm just testing it out. I normally, for me personally I never liked to do return to home. I like to manually land myself. Surprisingly not feeling much motion sickness, as I thought that I would have. When I'm playing the simulator, I do feel a little bit of motion sickness, but because maybe like I'm sitting, stable, not moving my head a lot, I feel pretty good. I can't believe how much fun I'm having. Dude, I almost hit you. I'd love to take off on one more flight. The problem is, these batteries Aren't charging fast enough, and I only have three. So this is my third flight, and this is something that I really wanna test out. This is the motion controller, so this is kind of an all new way to control the drone. It's basically gesture controlled. Here's your acceleration. There's a break . So I'm not gonna try the motion controller out just yet, I'm still getting my bearings and I also only have one battery left. So I wanna get a couple more flights in before we don't have any batteries left.
